projects.title: Crypto Trading Web App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a full-stack Django-based web application, focusing on the homepage, payment gateway, and currency exchange feature with real-time rates from CoinMarket API
 -  Contributed significantly to testing key functionalities, including user authentication, login, and signup
 - Visualized GitHub data to show collaboration

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Portfolio Website to provide a comprehensive overview for potential employers, clients, or collaborators
 -  Fully dynamic and supports various screen sizes
 - Dark Mode Support is also present

projects.title: SpeechEase
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an Android app with text-to-speech messaging, emoji-to-speech, multilingual support (English/French), and contextual templates for easy daily communication has empowered mute people.
 - Collaborated on 3 app features, driving a cost-effective Java-based Android app. As part of an 8-member team, I contributed significantly as a developer
 - Earned recognition as a top-performing team during Computer Science demo day at University of Windsor for its innovative impact

projects.title: IoT-Enabled Waste Management
projects.bodyText:
- Headed a 5-member team, driving the end-to-end creation of a Smart Waste Management System
 - Contributed to both hardware and software aspects by orchestrating a functional robotic model and actively shaping the project's website.
 - Designed and executed innovative features like automated waste segregation and real-time waste truck tracking, resulting in a noteworthy 2nd prize achievement in a competitive Hackathon.

projects.title: Stress Management App
projects.bodyText:
-  Teamed up with a classmate to create a Flutter-based Stress Management App, featuring stress-relieving music, videos, quotes, quizzes, and drawing activities.
 - Led UI development for a seamless user experience, while integrating external APIs for motivational content and multimedia.
 -  Employed Google Firebase to efficiently manage the app's database, ensuring smooth data storage and retrieval.
